channel.title: Ansible on Victor's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ansible on Victor's Blog

item.title: Getting Started with Ansible Molecule
item.description: Overview If you haven’t heard about Ansible Molecule you came to the right place. I will cover what it is, it’s basic usage, and how to install it and get started. What it is Ansible Molecule is a project (tool) that can greatly improve your Ansible workflow. It allows you to automate your tasks (which is great for CI) by providing means of running different and idempotent tests against your roles.
